title: Here is a reading list of 20 articles on methods for modeling semantic change, focusing on recent and influential works up to 2025

title: These articles cover a range of methods and approaches for modeling semantic change, including diachronic word embeddings, contextualized word representations, and various evaluation frameworks. They also include surveys and comprehensive reviews to provide a broad understanding of the field
